effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
